Title: Object: The Boils and Blains
Series: Dalziels' Bible Gallery
Description: A family on the terrace of a grand house; children with their heads in their hands around a stool on the left and a woman sitting on the right, looking at a man standing at the top of the steps, arms outstretched, bringing news; rolling clouds and an Egyptian palace in the background; touched proof. 1881? Wood-engraving with touches of white
Producer name: After: Thomas Bolton Gilchrist Septimus Dalziel
